history.content: I checked in with Cindy Connors, our Enrollment Manager for CS, and she told me that it was up to the instructors for each class to set up the structure of their discussion and lab sections. I just went and looked at 170 and 186 in the online Schedule of Classes, and I see remote options for discussions for both of those classes. This may not be true for all classes, though.

Did you look in the Schedule of Classes? I checked in with Cindy Connors, our Enrollment Manager for CS, and she told me that it was up to the instructors for each class to set up the structure of their discussion and lab sections. I just went and looked at 170 and 186, and I see remote options for discussions for both of those classes. This may not be true for all classes, though.

^ As the title said, will discussion section of courses such as 170 186 provide the remote choice as well? I guess we may choose the section after fall semester begin. If in-person is mandatory I gonna get an accommodation soon. Appreciate for any information <3
history.subject: Will discussion section given remote choice this fall?
